title: Birmingham police investigate after 4-year-old shot off Crestwood Boulevard
content:
BIRMINGHAM, AL (WBRC) -
Police are responding to the shooting of a child off of Crestwood Boulevard.
The shooting happened at the Logan's Roadhouse, which is on Ludington Lane.
Police say the 4-year-old girl was shot in the leg, driven to a nearby service station and was taken to the hospital with non-life-threatening injuries.
Two vehicles and the Logan's building were also hit by gunfire, according to Sgt. Bryan Shelton. Police are investigating what led up to the shooting.
There are several police cruisers and an ambulance on scene at a Shell gas station across the boulevard from the Logan's.
We have a crew on scene now gathering more details so please check back for updates.
